explanation: All items except the Trowel are forms of personal protective gear worn on the body for gardening. A Trowel is a handheld tool.

category: Signers of the Declaration of Independence
explanation: John Hancock, Benjamin Franklin, Thomas Jefferson, and John Adams were all signers of the Declaration of Independence. George Washington, while a pivotal Founding Father, did not sign it as he was leading the Continental Army at the time.
Muffle, Amplify, Resonate, and Echo all describe ways sound can be altered, prolonged, or perceived after it has been produced. Vibrate, however, describes the physical motion that *produces* sound.
